title: Nabi: Why?
description:
The brief was to encourage parents to buy the Nabi tablet for their children.

Insight: Children are very curious and are always asking questions. They ask questions even parents don't know or are tired of answering.

This is where the Nabi Tablet comes in. When a parent doesn't know the answers or are overwhelmed by a child's questions, they can give them the Nabi Tablet. This will answer all their questions while also giving parents a break.
